opinion: Better than Roscoes Chicken and Waffles
The food is not cheap fast food, but thats a good thing
I have been to both the original Bruxie in old town Orange and the one in Brea and they are both packed every day
The waffle bun on the patty melt was nice and crisp and complimented the grilled onions on the Angus patty perfectly
The strawberry lemonade was to die for
I didnt try any of the desserts
The waffle was great because it didnt get soggy from the dressing
It did get kind of crowded (went around 6 or 7pm) so I suppose if you come at a busy time you might not be able to get a seat
If you are in or near Orange, you have got to stop by
Pricey but worth it as a nice treat
deliciously crispy, yet fluffy waffle sandwiches
Most items are worth the money
fun place to go and meet people
BILL is the coolest person here
Definitely something that you must try
They get through the line fast
will certainly help you start your day on the right food
one bite quickly changed my mind. Food is delicious
biggest problem we had was in finding seating as it does get very busy
you'll know what kind of pretentious place it is
food isn't too impressive for the price
